Text: Nice effort man really appreciated... but 5.47 GB is just a little to large for a episode of only 1 hour, it's just to big to store an entire season (10 episodes= 54.7 GB), still I think you did a great job in uploading this, maybe find a better compression?

Good work, man. Keep uploading it. Don's listen to lievenazerty.
I prefere to watch such great series in high quality. If lievenazerty can't afford himself a good large-screen HD TV and a couple of 4 TB mediastorages, it doesn't mean noboday else can.

It's not about the HDTV, I download all my show 720p, but yeah storage capacity is the issue here, a 2TB nas station that's completely filled up makes me wonder how much I download :) As for don't listen to me, there are better compressions available, switching form MPEG2 to MKV would already be a HUGE win... just sayin'
